00060 #include "EALib/sqr.h"
00061 #include "ZNconfig.h"
00062 #include "EALib/Population.h"
00063 
00064 using namespace std;
00065 
00066 //=======================================================================
00067 //
00068 // fitness function: sphere model
00069 //
00070 double sphere( const vector< double >& x )
00071 {
00072     unsigned i;
00073     double   sum;
00074     for( sum = 0., i = 0; i < x.size( ); i++ )
00075         sum += sqr( i * ( x[ i ] + i ) );
00076     return sum;
00077 }
00078 
00079 //=======================================================================
00080 //
00081 // main program
00082 //
00083 int main( int argc, char **argv )
00084 {
00085     //
00086     // constants
00087     //
00088     const unsigned Mu           = 4;
00089     const unsigned Lambda       = 20;
00090     const unsigned Dimension    = 30;
00091     const unsigned Iterations   = 2000;
00092     const unsigned Interval     = 10;
00093 
00094     const double   MinInit      = -3;
00095     const double   MaxInit      = +5;
00096     const double   SigmaInit    = 1;
00097 
00098     unsigned       i, t;
00099 
00100     //
00101     // initialize random number generator
00102     //
00103     Rng::seed( argc > 1 ? atoi( argv[ 1 ] ) : 1234 );
00104 
00105     //
00106     // parameters for the derandomized step size adaptation
00107     //
00108     ChromosomeT< double >::DerandomConst derandom( Dimension );
00109 
00110     //
00111     // define populations
00112     //
00113     Population parents   ( Mu,     ChromosomeT< double >( derandom.nobj( ) ),
00114                                    ChromosomeT< double >( derandom.npar( ) ) );
00115     Population offsprings( Lambda, ChromosomeT< double >( derandom.nobj( ) ),
00116                                    ChromosomeT< double >( derandom.npar( ) ) );
00117 
00118     //
00119     // minimization task
00120     //
00121     parents   .setMinimize( );
00122     offsprings.setMinimize( );
00123 
00124     //
00125     // initialize parent population
00126     //
00127     for( i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i ) {
00128         dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[ i ][ 0 ] ).initialize( MinInit, MaxInit );
00129         dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[ i ][ 1 ] ).initializeDerandom( SigmaInit, SigmaInit );
00130     }
00131 
00132     //
00133     // iterate
00134     //
00135     for( t = 0; t < Iterations; ++t ) {
00136         //
00137         // generate new offsprings: no recombination, only reproduction
00138         //
00139         offsprings.reproduce( parents );
00140 
00141         //
00142         // mutate object variables and adapt strategy parameter
00143         //
00144         for( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i )
00145             dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ] ).mutateDerandom( offsprings[ i ][ 1 ], derandom );
00146 
00147         //
00148         // evaluate objective function (parameters in chromosome #0)
00149         //
00150         for( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i )
00151             offsprings[ i ].setFitness( sphere( dynamic_cast< vector< double >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00152 
00153         //
00154         // select (mu,lambda)
00155         //
00156         parents.selectMuLambda( offsprings );
00157 
00158         //
00159         // print out best value found so far
00160         //
00161         if( t % Interval == 0 )
00162             cout << t << "\tbest value = "
00163                  << parents.best( ).fitnessValue( ) << endl;
00164     }
00165 
00166     return 0;
00167 }
